Pattern.name: Chain of Responsibility
Pattern.Desc: Avoid coupling the sender of a request to its receiver by giving more than one object a chance to handle the request. Chain the receiving objects and pass the request along the chain until an object handles it.

Node.name: Handler
Node.Desc: Defines an interface for handling requests, and implements the successor link.

Node.name: ConcreteHandler1
Node.Desc: Handles requests it is responsible for, and can access its successor.

Node.name: ConcreteHandler2
Node.Desc: Handles requests it is responsible for, and can access its successor.

Node.name: Client
Node.Desc: Initiates the request to a ConcreteHandler object on the chain.
